chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: The following instructions show how to install the package. There are basically two options: either through the admin interface or via the command line.

sect1.title: Admin Interface
sect1.para:
The package can be installed, updated or uninstalled using the following URL through the admin interface (make sure that the user is in the admin group):
http://localhost/otrs/index.pl?Action=AdminPackageManager

sect1.title: Command Line
sect1.para: If it is not possible to use the admin interface, the following command line tool ("bin/otrs.PackageManager.pl") can be used.
